name: NBA Trades: 2004 Quiz | NBA Players | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which player was traded twice in a 10 day span?
questions.explanation:
Rasheed Wallace.

	Rasheed started the year playing for Portland, he was then dealt to Atlanta where he played in only one game, and was then dealt to Detroit.

questions.text: Boston traded Mike James to Detroit in a deal. In return they received a draft pick, and which other player?
questions.explanation:
Chucky Atkins.

	Detroit got Rasheed Wallace and Mike James. Boston got Chucky Atkins and Detroit's 2004 first-round pick.  Atlanta got Zeljko Rebraca, Bob Sura, Chris Mills, and a future Detroit first-round pick.

questions.text: Which player did New Orleans trade Sean Rooks for?
questions.explanation:
Shammond Williams.

	New Orleans traded Sean Rooks to Orlando for Shammond Williams, straight up on Feb 19th.

questions.text: Which team was Gordan Giricek traded to?
questions.explanation:
Utah.

	Orlando traded Giricek to Utah for Deshawn Stevenson and a second round draft pick.

questions.text: Michael Doleac was traded by New York to the Atlanta Hawks.  Which team did he end up with after Atlanta cut him?
questions.explanation:
Denver.

	In a three team deal, Atlanta acquired Nazr Mohammed, Doleac, and a 2005 draft pick. Then to clear cap space they cut Doleac.

questions.text: Portland traded Rasheed Wallace and Wesley Person to Atlanta for Shareef Abdur-Rahim, Theo Ratliff, and Dan Dickau. How many games did Wallace play for Atlanta in 2004?
questions.explanation:
1.

	Wallace was traded to Detroit only 10 days after being acquired from Portland.

questions.text: Which team did Darius Miles play for before being traded to Portland?
questions.explanation:
Cleveland.

	Portland got Darius Miles for Jeff McInnis and Ruben Boumtje Boumtje.

questions.text: Which team was Charlie Ward traded to, before being cut and signed by the San Antonio?
questions.explanation:
Phoenix.

	New York acquired Stephon Marbury, Anfernee Hardaway, and Cezary Trybanski from Phoenix, for Howard Eisley, Maciej Lampe, Antonio McDyess, Charlie Ward, the draft rights to Milos Vujanic, an unconditional 2004 first-round draft pick, and a conditional future first-round pick.

questions.text: Which team received more players in the New York/Houston trade on December 30th?
options: both got the same number of players
they didn't make a trade in 2004
questions.explanation:
New York.

	New York traded Clarence Weatherspoon to Houston, for John Amaechi and Moochie Norris.

questions.text: Who or what was Monty Williams traded for?
questions.explanation:
A draft pick.

	Monty Williams and a second round draft pick were traded to Orlando for a second round draft pick. The move was made to clear cap space in Philadelphia.
